Package com.unitedcaterers.serverwithoutlockcookie

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientProxy
    This is a client proxy object that is instantiated on the server side for every client.
    RMIServerMain
    This class provides the startup method for the RMI Server application.
    RMIUCServerImpl
    Notice that in this package (com.unitedcaterers.serverwithoutcookie) RMIUCServer implements UCServerFactory, while in com.unitedcaterers.server package RMIUCServer implements UCServer.
    ServerPropertiesDialog
    This class provides a simple GUI to capture parameters required to run RMI based server.
